title: Interdisciplinary Simulation Education to Enhance Collaborative Learning Readiness for Medical Science Students

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary medical knowledge and primary clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Evaluation of collaborative competencies through a process where medical and nursing students form joint teams to resolve patient cases in VR simulation environments

learning_goals: Students can apply role distribution and communication strategies in interdisciplinary teams.
Learners demonstrate attitudes improved by at least 15% based on the Readiness for Interprofessional Learning Scale (RIPLS).
Participants successfully perform patient management protocols at least three times in VR simulations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
